result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. ALFONSO LOPEZ

defendant.name: LOPEZ, ALFONSO
defendant.address: 571 Cty Rd A, C/O Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on November 15, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
OSPD APPOINTMENT OF COUNSEL REPORT - defendant qualified but no attorney yet.

No Contact with the victim. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Second appearance on October 11, 2022 at 08:15 am.

ADDRESS INFO for ALFONSO LOPEZ
Current: 571 Cty Rd A, C/O Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941 United States  (Effective: 10-04-2022)
Prior: 479 Oak St Apt 7, Berlin, WI 54923

No Contact with the victim. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.

8:35 AM Defendant ALFONSO LOPEZ in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 2022CF152 & 2022CF174. Atty Kapelis represents the defendant on another case and has not been appointed on it. Court goes over right to counsel and how to obtain one. 2022CF152-Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $1,000.00 cash bond and conditions of: No Contact with the victim. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set both cases for Status of counsel on October 11, 2022 at 8:15 AM. Court reminds the defendant he is scheduled for a JT on another case and to keep in touch with his attorney.

Court adjourned at 8:39 AM
Adjourned initial appearance on October 4, 2022 at 08:30 am. / Defendant was mailed a copy of the criminal complaint.

9:46 AM Defendant ALFONSO LOPEZ appeared by telephone.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant has no objection to holding this hearing by zoom. Defendant did not receive the criminal complaint. Court sets adjourned initial appearance for October 4, 2022 at 8:30 AM. Mandatory appearance.

Court adjourned at 9:48 AM
Def called and stated his ride fell through and requested zoom information. Def's address and phone number were verified. Def was given the zoom information.
